resources.string: Tap \"Connect again\". Transfer progress will resume from where you left off.
Looks like another device is using Mi Mover nearby. Connect now?
"Couldn't connect to the new device for a long time. Connect manually."
"The code hasn't been entered for a long time. Connect manually."
Enter a %d-digit code on your old device.
Created hotspot successfully. Waiting to connect…
The code you entered is incorrect
Looks like MIUI is backing up items now. Stop ongoing backups or reboot your device to allow Mi Mover to start the transfer.
Your device is using mobile data due to system restrictions now. Turn off mobile data and connect to the new device again.

"Note: After creating a new security question and confirming your date of birth, your Apple ID two-factor authentication will be turned off. If you don't see the option to turn off two-factor authentication on the Apple ID account page, you can't turn it off."
1. Open any web browser on any computer and go to appleid.apple.com.
2. Sign in to the Apple ID you want to disable two-factor authentication for, go to the \"Security\" section of the account settings and choose \"Edit\".
3. Click \"Turn Off Two-Factor Authentication\". Click again to confirm.
Follow these steps to turn off two-factor authentication for Apple ID:
Turn off Apple ID two-factor authentication
Looks like your device is connected to a VPN now. Turn off VPN to be able to connect to other devices.
Looks like sync is off for Gallery items and contacts. Turn on sync to make these items appear on this device.
Make sure that your iCloud account has been activated. If not, go to icloud.com and follow the instructions in order to activate your account.
"Couldn't connect to the network. Connect to Wi-Fi to import items from iCloud."

"1. Make sure the latest version of Mi Mover is installed on your old device. You can download the latest version of Mi Mover in GetApps or use this link: %1$s. 2. If the hotspot of the new device doesn't appear in Mi Mover, open Wi-Fi settings and check if you can see it there. If you do, don't tap it. 3. Go back to Mi Mover and tap the name of the hotspot."
If your old device is a third party Android phone:
Mi Mover is pre-installed on all devices running MIUI 11. If you have an older MIUI version, you can download the latest version of Mi Mover in GetApps or use this link: %1$s.
If your old device is a Mi phone:
Current system settings restrict transferring data using Mi Mover.
"You won't be able to transfer password-protected backups. Turn off backup password before using Mi Mover."
Looks like connecting automatically takes too long. Try connecting manually.
"Mi Mover doesn't currently support transferring data to or from tablets."
提交成功，即将退出“小米换机”
How do you feel about Mi Mover?
Give us a few suggestions so we could improve our app?
Thanks! Rate Mi Mover in GetApps as well?

Welcome to Mi Mover! You can use this app to transfer data from iCloud or your old device to a new one. This app needs to connect to the internet and requires the following permissions to be able to work normally:
Allow this app to connect to the internet and grant the mandatory permissions listed above.
These permissions are required to make the basic features and services of this app available.

string.name: dialog_request_permission_message_link
string.Data: "At the same time, to fully understand your rights as a user as well as the ways in which we use your data, read and agree to our User Agreement and Privacy Policy."

resources.string: At the same time, to fully understand your rights as a user as well as the ways in which we use your data, read and agree to our %1$s and %2$s.
Looks like Mi Mover is too old. Update Mi Mover to its latest version to be able to transfer files.
"Couldn't transfer WeChat app data and chat history due to app restrictions. Try the in-app backup feature. Open WeChat and go to Me > Settings > General > Back up & migrate chats."
Incompatible app version. Install this app separately.
Not enough storage on the new device
"This app doesn't have the permissions required for it to access Calendar. Go to Settings and check permissions to continue."
"The following items couldn't be transferred to the new device."
"The new version of Mi Mover isn't compatible with the one installed on this device. Download and install the new version."
Download the new version of Mi Mover
Connect to the new device manually
Looks like you have unfinished transfer tasks. Continue with the transfer?
"Can't find Mi Mover? Tap to download."
"1. Go to Settings on your old device. 2. Enter \"Mi Mover\" in the search bar. 3. Tap \"Mi Mover\" in the search results."
"The version of Mi Mover on your old device isn't compatible with the one installed here. Update Mi Mover on your old device."
Open Mi Mover on your old device
"Select the page that you see on your old device. If you're using the old version of Mi Mover, we'll tell you how to update it."
Go to Settings, enter \"Mi Mover\" in the search bar, and tap \"Mi Mover\" in the search results.
1. Open Mi Mover on your old device
2. Select the page that you see on your old device.
"Couldn't find Mi Mover? Tap to download."
Make sure the latest version of Mi Mover is installed on the other device; otherwise, two devices might not be able to connect.
If it takes too long for your old device to find the hotspot, try connecting manually.
"There isn't enough storage space on the new device to start a transfer."
Your Apple ID uses two-factor authentication. Enter verification code.
"Couldn't send verification code. Wait a minute or two and try again."
"If you can't receive the verification code, make sure that you've already signed in to iCloud on your Apple device."
How to turn off two-factor authentication
"Attention 1. To import items from an iOS device, use the latest backup or sync all items before starting the transfer."
"2. Your Apple ID and password will only be used for signing in. They won't be stored or recorded by Mi Mover."
"You aren't connected to Wi-Fi now. Use mobile data to import items from iCloud?"
"You aren't connected to Wi-Fi now. To import data from iCloud, connect to Wi-Fi."
Connect to Wi-Fi to be able to import items from an iPhone.
Your apple ID was locked due to security reasons. Go to iforgot.apple.com and follow instructions.
Tap Allow on your iOS device and enter the code that appears on it here.
"Why can't my old device connect to the hotspot?"
"If you can't find your new device for a long time, try these: 1. Make sure Mi Mover is installed on your new device. 2. Bring the two devices close together."
Scan QR code to install Mi Mover on the new device
Scan QR code to install Mi Mover on the old device
Install Mi Mover on your new device
Scan this QR code with your iPhone to download and install the app.
Install Mi Mover on your new device to be able to connect. Tap to install.
"Text messages can't be transferred due to compatibility issues. Third party apps might restrict transferring their app data due to security reasons."
"8. Why can't text messages and app data of some third party apps be transferred?"
"Text messages and app data of some third party apps can't be transferred. Don't turn off Wi-Fi or switch between networks during the transfer."
Mi Mover needs the following permissions to work normally: %s.
For connecting to other devices nearby
1. Tap \"Connect to the new device manually\" on the old device.
3. Enter this password on the old device to connect.
"If you can't find this hotspot, refresh the list of the available Wi-Fi networks and try again."
Connect to the old device manually
Mi Mover needs this permission to learn what apps are installed on a device and transfer these apps to another one.
"Allow Mi Mover to access your location in order to find devices nearby. You won't be able to use Mi Mover unless you grant this permission."
"Allow Mi Mover to access your location in the High accuracy mode in order to find devices nearby. You won't be able to use Mi Mover unless you grant this permission."
Allow access to accurate location info
"\"I'm a sender\" button is right on the start page of Mi Mover."
"%d. Tap \"I'm a sender\" and wait a moment."
%d. Select this hotspot on your old device to connect.
"The Apple ID and password you entered don't match"
Allow Mi Mover to access your location to be able to find devices nearby.

"Not enough storage space. Mi Mover needs %1$s of additional storage space to create compressed packages before the transfer. 1. Try transferring only important items. 2. Don't select apps with a lot of data. 3. Use Cleaner to free up storage space."
"There's no need to enter password in the new version of Mi Mover. Just open Mi Mover on your old device, tap \"I'm a sender\", and tap the name of the hotspot to connect."
Mi Mover needs storage space to create a transfer package on your old device before sending it to the new one. Free up storage space to be able to continue.
There might be device, system, and app version compatibility issues that prevent some apps from being transferred successfully.
"Some apps (e.g. financial services and payment tools) don't allow transferring passwords due to security reasons."
Your new Mi phone might not have the required permissions to do that.
Mi Mover will be able to pick up from where you left off. However, you might have to start over if device compatibility issues prevent you from resuming the interrupted transfer.
WeChat history from your old device will overwrite the WeChat history of your new device during the transfer.
1. Make sure Mi Mover on your new device is up to date. You can download the latest version of Mi Mover in GetApps or use this link: %1$s.
"2. If the hotspot still won't appear in Mi Mover, open Wi-Fi settings and check if you can see it there. If so, go back to Mi Mover and tap the name of the hotspot."
"1. Why can't I see the hotspot of the new device on the old one?"
2. What is the password of the hotspot?
"3. Why does it say that there's not enough storage space on the old device?"
"4. Why aren't all apps transferred successfully?"
"5. Why aren't passwords of some third party app accounts transferred successfully?"
"6. Why can't app data be transferred from a third party device?"
7. If I leave Mi Mover in the middle of a transfer, will I have to start over next time?
8. Why did my WeChat history disappear on the new device?
"1. Open Mi Mover on your old device. 2. Tap \"I'm a sender\" and wait for a moment. 3. Select the following hotspot on the old device."
"\"I'm a sender\" button is right on the start page of Mi Mover."
"1. Tap \"I'm a sender\" and wait a moment."
2. Select the following Wi-Fi hotspot on the old device.
"Mi Mover needs to create a local backup on this device. There's not enough storage space to create a backup now. Free up some space first."
"Themes, wallpapers, transport cards, key cards can't be transferred using Mi Mover."
Some apps put strict security measures in place to prevent app data from being transferred. Such apps may include banking apps or financial services.
"Due to system restrictions, items from Second space can't be transferred using Mi Mover."
"Dual apps and their data also can't be transferred. You can transfer corresponding main apps, though."
Signing in to iCloud on the old iOS device…
Received all data successfully. Tap to view results.
Sent all data successfully. Tap to view results.
Connection was interrupted. Trying to connect again…
"Don't close Mi Mover while it's transferring items."
"Receiving data now. Don't turn off Wi-Fi or switch between networks."
"Sending data now. Don't turn off Wi-Fi or switch between networks."
Select the items to transfer on the old device
%d. Turn on sync for contacts and Gallery items.
Turn on sync to make contacts and Gallery items appear on this device.
Third party apps and app data
Access and save items to storage
Mi Mover needs to access app usage stats. Give Mi Mover the required permissions in the Settings.
For transferring calendar events from iCloud
For transferring call history to your new device
For transferring contacts to your new device
For transferring messages to your new device
For transferring files and photos to your new device

These apps have already generated app data on your new device
"Dual apps can't be transferred. However, you can transfer original apps."
"You're using dual apps for the following items"
"Items from Second space can't be transferred due to system restrictions."
"Don't turn off Wi-Fi or switch between networks until the transfer is complete."
"Transferring big amounts of data wirelessly might cause slight overheating which isn't abnormal. Your device will cool down soon after the transfer is complete."
Your device might heat up during transfers.
Tap the button below to try again.
"Your items were synced with Xiaomi Cloud. Sign in to your Mi Account to restore them."
"The transfer was interrupted. The data which wasn't imported must be imported again."
"Not enough storage space. Free up at least %s."
Select only important items to make the transfer faster.
"Can't transfer app data (including WeChat and QQ chat history) from non-Xiaomi devices."
"You'll have to connect the two devices again if you quit Mi Mover now. Quit anyway?"
"Don't turn off Wi-Fi or switch between networks during the transfer."
Due to third party app restrictions, chat histories and other app data on your new device will be replaced with those from the old one after the transfer is complete.
"Make sure that you signed in with this account on your Apple device. Otherwise, you won't be able to receive the code."
"Make sure you've backed up all important items before erasing data on this device."

Mi Mover needs this permission to ensure the stability of the transfer process.
Mi Mover needs this permission to turn on Wi-Fi and create a hotspot for transferring files.
